sentences.sentence: She calls herself "a clumsy (笨拙的) student, just like Guo Jing from Legends of the Condor Heroes, but one of loyal heart".
sentences.translation: 她称自己就像“《射雕英雄传》中的郭靖一样，是一个笨拙的学生，但有一颗忠诚的心”。

sentences.sentence: One example is the California condor.
sentences.translation: 有一个加利福尼亚秃鹫的例子。

sentences.sentence: A very large bird - they call it a condor - was circling in the sky.
sentences.translation: 一只很大的鸟，他们管它叫神鹰，正在天空盘旋。
